name: DiceySoccer
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

GAMEPLAY:

It's a soccer game where the ball is a dice and when you score you get a random amount of points

CONTROLS: 

Keyboard: 

left shift = sprint

space = kick(hold right before you hit the dice then let go)

r = start

Controller:

a = sprint

x or b = kick(hold right before you hit the dice then let go)

y = start

CREDITS: 

field: https://godlabs.itch.io/football-field

goal: https://kumasousa.itch.io/soccer-goal

dice: https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/low-poly-dice-game-asset-pack

TO INSTALL: 

On Windows:  1) Download the file (click the "download now" on this page) 2) Right click on the downloaded zip and "Extract All" to a folder. 3) Enter the new folder and run "DiceySoccer.exe"
